PROTECT YOUR PRIVACY

Privatzy is a unique solution where privacy, cybersecurity and spam control intersect.

Spam filters cannot catch all the spam. Privatzy eliminates undesirable marketing emails, protects you from viruses, malware and saves you time every day.

50% of our login credential is our email address, but we freely give them out without a thought. The world has been trying to solve the password problem. The culprit is the email address.

Privatzy protects your email address by providing unique email addresses that land in your current Inbox. We do that without accessing your email account, so you are in control of your privacy.

Save up to 8 hours a month by fully utilizing Privatzy to reduce the number of unwanted emails in your Inbox.
